Retrieving the records of parliamentary questions via Taiwan Legislative Yuan API 委員質詢事項

get_parlquestions.Rd

Retrieving the records of parliamentary questions via Taiwan Legislative Yuan API 委員質詢事項

get_parlquestions(term = 8, session_period = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

term

Requesting questions from the term. The parameter should be set in a numeric format. The default value is 8.

verbose

The default value is TRUE, displaying the description of data retrieved in number, url and computing time.

sessionPeriod

session in the term. The session is between 1 and 6.

Value

A list object contains a tibble carrying

See also

https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=6

Examples

get_parlquestions(term = 8, session_period = 2)
#>  Retrieved URL: 
#>  https://data.ly.gov.tw/odw/ID6Action.action?term=08&sessionPeriod=02&sessionTimes=&item=&fileType=json 
#>  Retrieved sessionPeriod:  2 
#>  Retrieved sessionPeriod:  923 
#> $title
#> [1] "the records of parliarmentary questions"
#> 
#> $query_time
#> [1] "2023-01-19 03:08:28 UTC"
#> 
#> $retrieved_number
#> [1] 923
#> 
#> $retrieved_term
#> [1] 8
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://data.ly.gov.tw/odw/ID6Action.action?term=08&sessionPeriod=02&sessionTimes=&item=&fileType=json"
